transcript: I don't care what you do see you could paint your body bright green and run Dakin through the palace venom and run off with every man in the world and I shouldn't say a word as long as I know that you love me best

Dakin through the palace venom and run off with every man in the world and I shouldn't say a word as long as I know that you love me best

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I don't care what you do.  See, you could paint your body bright green and and run naked through the Place Vendome and run with every man in the world and I shan't say a word.  As long as I know that you love me best.
